name: TerraTest
description:
Demo version, still a work in progress.

Clone of Terraria written in C. Game is open source under MIT license, you can browse source code here.

Controls:

  • A, D to move around
  • Space to jump
  • Tab to open crafting menu
  • Right click to place blocks
  • Left click to break blocks
  • Scroll wheel to move through inventory


NOTE: Save files have not been implemented yet so don't get to attached to anything you build.
